<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get transferable BRC-20 inscriptions</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/brc20/{ticker}/addresses/{address}/transferable"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get BRC-20 transferable inscriptions by address and ticker.
